text: Ashe, kuma ba su yi tafiya ba, a cikin ƙasa, domin su duba yadda aƙibar waɗannan da suke a gabaninsu ta kasance? Alhali kuwa sun kasance mafifita ƙarfi daga gare su? Kuma Allah bai kasance wani abu na iya rinjayarSa ba, a cikin sammai, kuma haka a cikin kaƙa. Lalle Shi ne Ya kasance Masani, Mai ikon yi
